unknown-server-error: Oops! Something went wrong on our end.
provide-token: Please provide your token to access this endpoint.
provide-valid-token: Your token is invalid or expired.
do-not-have-required-role: Only user(s) with the {roles} role(s) are allowed to access this endpoint.
home-is-not-yours: This home doesn't belong to you.
email-taken: Email is already in use. Please choose another.
user-not-found: No user found with the email address {email}.
